author: Anonymous, Anonymous
title: One of my patients died having tested positive for coronavirus. I'm sad and angry – what if I passed it to them?
description: I now have symptoms. But without routine testing how am I to know whether I picked it up from the patient or a colleague, or whether I passed on the virus as an asymptomatic carrier?
content: I recently met a patient with a new diagnosis of an aggressive form of cancer, whose prognosis is usually measured in weeks and months. During the consultation, they were understandably frightened and tearful and I did my best to support her while trying to b… [+4383 chars]
